projects.title: DP Creator
projects.descr:
DP, as Document Profile, aims to create a document that normally a RH campany always asked to the candidate fill with software like Microsoft word. And to study technology capable of generate PDF on client side.

With this project, the candidate dont need to open that kind of software (Word), only a browser, select the some fields and generate a PDF file to send to RH campany.

The generation of the PDF file is executed and created only on client side, which is the browser.
projects.frameworks: JSPDF, JSDF Plugin: AutoTable, jQuery, Twitter Bootstrap;
